properties.description: Json data (FHIR NDJSON) exploration with Serverless

content.query:
SELECT   TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://medicaldl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/fhir_ndjson/1tb/*/Observation.ndjson',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]

SELECT   TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Observation.ndjson',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'JSONSource',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]

/* Flatten the NDJSO with JSON_VALUE, JSON_QUERY on CROSS APPLY OPENJSON */
/* refreence: https://diangermishuizen.com/query-json-data-in-sql-server-and-synapse-analytics/ */
/* Query 1, with only JSON_VALUE, JSON_QUERY */
SELECT top 100
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.resourceType') AS resourceType,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.id') AS id,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.status') AS status,
    JSON_query(line, '$.category') AS category_string ,
    JSON_query(line, '$.code') AS code_string
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Observation.ndjson',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'JSONSource',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        -- FIELDQUOTE and FIELDTERMINATOR are set to 0x0b as we do not expect to find it in the file.
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]

/* Query 2, add CROSS APPLY OPENJSON to read array */
SELECT  top 100
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.resourceType') AS resourceType,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.id') AS id,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.status') AS status,
    JSON_query(line, '$.valueQuantity') AS valueQuantity_string,
    valueQuantity_NestedArray_value,
    valueQuantity_NestedArray_unit ,
    JSON_query(line, '$.category') AS category_string
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Observation.ndjson',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'JSONSource',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        -- FIELDQUOTE and FIELDTERMINATOR are set to 0x0b as we do not expect to find it in the file.
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON 
    (JSON_QUERY([line], '$.valueQuantity')) /*Note, if you want only the top most record from this array, replace this line with "(JSON_QUERY([jsonContent], '$.attribute_with_nested_array[0]'))"*/
WITH(
    [valueQuantity_NestedArray_value] varchar(255) '$.value',
    [valueQuantity_NestedArray_unit] varchar(255) '$.unit'
) AS [valueQuantity_NestedArray]


/* Query 3, multiple CROSS APPLY OPENJSON to read */
SELECT  top 100
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.resourceType') AS resourceType,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.id') AS id,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.status') AS status,
    JSON_query(line, '$.valueQuantity') AS valueQuantity_string,
    valueQuantity_NestedArray_value,
    valueQuantity_NestedArray_unit ,
    JSON_query(line, '$.category') AS category_string,
    encounter_reference
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Observation.ndjson',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'JSONSource',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        -- FIELDQUOTE and FIELDTERMINATOR are set to 0x0b as we do not expect to find it in the file.
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON 
    (JSON_QUERY([line], '$.valueQuantity')) /*Note, if you want only the top most record from this array, replace this line with "(JSON_QUERY([jsonContent], '$.attribute_with_nested_array[0]'))"*/
WITH(
    [valueQuantity_NestedArray_value] varchar(255) '$.value',
    [valueQuantity_NestedArray_unit] varchar(255) '$.unit'
) AS [valueQuantity_NestedArray]
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON 
    (JSON_QUERY([line], '$.encounter')) 
WITH(
    [encounter_reference] varchar(255) '$.reference'
) AS [encounter_reference_NestedArray]
